scripts.predev: sh -c 'p=$(lsof -ti:3051 || true); if [ -n "$p" ]; then echo Killing PID $p on :3051; kill $p || true; sleep 0.5; p2=$(lsof -ti:3051 || true); if [ -n "$p2" ]; then echo Force-killing PID $p2 on :3051; kill -9 $p2 || true; fi; fi'
scripts.predev:watch: sh -c 'p=$(lsof -ti:3051 || true); if [ -n "$p" ]; then echo Killing PID $p on :3051; kill $p || true; sleep 0.5; p2=$(lsof -ti:3051 || true); if [ -n "$p2" ]; then echo Force-killing PID $p2 on :3051; kill -9 $p2 || true; fi; fi'
scripts.dev:bg: nohup npm run dev > server.log 2>&1 & echo $!
